description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5sp50","text":"Identifying pathogens, resistance-conferring mutations, and strain types through targeted amplicon sequencing is an important tool. However, due to the limitations of short read sequencing, many applications require the division of limited clinical samples. Here, we present stilPCR (single-tube Illumina long read PCR), which allows the generation of hemi-nested amplicons in a single tube, with Illumina indexes and adapters, effectively increasing the Illumina read length without increasing the input requirements of reagents or sample. We have successfully utilized stilPCR on clinical sputum from tuberculosis patients to detect drug resistance mutations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases

{"blocks":[{"key":"123q8","text":"Thaw the NEBNext Library Quant Master Mix and NEBNext Library Quant Primer Mix. Ensure mixing of NEBNext Library Quant Primer Mix by vortexing. Place reagents on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6of8a","text":"Thaw the NEBNext Library Quant DNA Standards, tubes 1–6. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m424","text":"Mix by pulse vortexing on a low setting. Briefly spin to collect material from the sides of the tubes. Place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"au8mq","text":"Thaw the NEBNext Library Quant Dilution Buffer (10X). Mix well by vortexing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4a2c7","text":"Centrifuge briefly to collect material from the sides of the tube.
